intro_first_subtitle: It lets you focus on the routines you will have to do today. Combining both Goal tracker and Habits tracker.
intro_second_subtitle: View your plans for month, weeks, use the daily planner and schedule. Find the most suitable time for future tasks.
intro_third_subtitle: Follow you progress in various areas. Improve your productivity by creating a flexible system of skills.
